description: Park and pipe skis for junior shredders. The Souphead SLR's twintip design lets up-and-coming rippers show up their parents. A structured top and durable base mean they stand up to rail bails and even drops down lodge stairs. Included SLR bindings are light and reliable.Structured surface with E Base Black offers durability and flex tuned for young tricksters.Most versatile ski in Head's junior ski lineup performs in variable snow conditions.Twintip construction makes for a fun ride.Includes SLR 4.5 GW AC bindings.
name: Head Souphead SLR Skis - Children to Youths
